con:testCase.name: PolicyCheckPermit
con:testCase.con:description: Disabled the mock permit step because that is the default in the gateway; and SoapUI now seems to be sending only one response per mock step and then shutting down the mock. This results in a failure becaue the PE is unavailable. This test case now checks the positive case.
